section.title: Groups []
section.para:
Groups allow you to organize nodes with a similar configuration. They are the building blocks for creating group links which define how information moves through your network.
Group ID [NODE_GROUP_ID]
Unique identifier for the group.
Description [DESCRIPTION]
Description of the group that is available through the console.

important.para: A node can only belong to ONE group

tip.para: Create a group for similar nodes that will pass data in the same manner.
